page.title: 06Employment in Langho area
page.content: Although no major employer in area there is very little unemployment . It has many small businesses run from home premises e.g. electrician , plumber , hairdresser , taxi service , printers , photographer , roofing contracters , all owned by qualified tradespeople and family firms , also shopkeepers and publicans . The farms are dairy and sheep and some also run as guest houses and farmhouse restaurants . The milk roundsman sells local farm bottled milk . There is a broad spectrum of workers living in the area e.g. cleaners , road workers , refuse collector , and proffesional people such as hospital consultants , doctors, dentist , nurses , teachers , accountant , solicitors , bank manager, and local government officers .
